analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0xa9cf571ea4efaaf1a214b4556a3422976c247fbd.sol:
	Contract WazobiaToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0xa9cf571ea4efaaf1a214b4556a3422976c247fbd.sol#239-240)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0xa9cf571ea4efaaf1a214b4556a3422976c247fbd.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/30/0xa9cf571ea4efaaf1a214b4556a3422976c247fbd.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/30/0xa9cf571ea4efaaf1a214b4556a3422976c247fbd.sol#84) is not in mixedCase
